Pascale Obolo (amụrụ na abali asaa nke onwa  Jenụwarị  ago 1967) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe si mba  Cameroon.

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Conservatoire Libre du Cinéma Français na Mahadum Paris nke Paris nke asatọ, amaara ya maka ihe nkiri  gbasara nwanyị ya na-ndekọ ụmụ nwanyị na agba egwu ike na mpaghara French na omenala egwu Afrịka

N'afọ 2005, o wepụtara ihe nkiri izizi ya, Calypso na Dirty Jim's, ụri akwa maka calypso na Trinidad, nke nwetara  ọtụtụ onyinye n'afọ 2006 gụnyere International Pan-African Film Festival nke Cannes na African Diaspora Film Festival na New York. N'afọ 2008, o mepụtara obere ihe nkiri La Femme invisible (Nwanyi na- adighi ahu anya). Ihe nkiri mbụ ya zuru oke bụ ihe nkiri banyere Calypso Rose na 2011.

Obolo so na ndị guzobere magazin nka Afrikadaa, ma sonyekwa na African Art Book Fair (AABF). Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Goethe Institute na Cameroon ruo ọtụtụ afọ na ihe ọ kọwara dị ka "ọrụ ihe nkiri na-ezute mbipụta".
